purpose: Enable developers to create and deploy custom engineering agents that interact with and enhance their codebases.
principle: Leverages prompt-based generation to create agents that can understand and interact with code, using AI frameworks and knowledge graphs.
reusability: Designed for easy integration into existing codebases with API support for custom agent creation and deployment.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited stability and feature set; primarily supports Python environments.
name: potpie
description: Prompt-To-Agent : Create custom engineering agents for your codebase
highlight: Facilitates the creation of custom AI agents tailored for specific codebases, enhancing developer productivity and code management.
